Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE seguros.v0histsini SET situacao = :SITUACAO, LIMCRR = :LIMCRR WHERE num_apol_sinistro = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND numopg = :NUMOPG AND (operacao BETWEEN 2000 AND 2999 OR operacao BETWEEN 3000 AND 3999 OR operacao BETWEEN 8400 AND 8479 OR operacao BETWEEN 8500 AND 8579) AND operacao NOT IN (2010, 2020, 2050, 3010, 3020, 3050) END SQL
